特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
関連科目: No pre-requisite classes; only an interest in English.
授業方法:
<Face to Face>
This class will use lectures, pair-work, group-work, very short presentations, and practical exercises for all four skills.

第1回: Week 1, Class introduction, getting to know each other; the structure of TOEIC test
第2回: Week 2: Topic: Hobbies, role-play; TOEIC reading practice
第3回: Week 3: Topic Interests and abilities: group discussion/review, TOEIC structure/grammar practice; writing assignment
第4回:
Week 4: Computer classroom: Topic travel and other cultures
TOEIC listening practice; start project 1
第5回:
Week 5: Computer classroom:
Topic: travel and other cultures, pt. 2
第6回: Week 6: Topic: travel and other cultures. Presentation on study abroad options;
第7回:
Week 7: Start extensive reading project;
Topic: Entertainment
第10回: Week 10: Topic: People I admire;  Reading biographies
第11回: Week 11: Topic: People I admire, pt. 2;  Comparing biographies
第12回: Week 12: Topic, role-plays, vocabulary review: writing assignment due
第14回: Week 14: Finish all other classroom exercises; class consolidation
